00032   subroutine cput(sec)
00033     real :: sec
00034     integer :: ic1, ir1, im1
00035     !    CALL SYSTEM_CLOCK(COUNT=IC1, COUNT_RATE=IR1, COUNT_MAX=IM1)
00036     !    sec = 1.*ic1/ir1
00037 !    call cpu_time(sec)
00038     sec = 1.e-6*rtc()
00039   end subroutine cput

00043   ! Random number scrambler
00044   ! =======================
00045   !
00046   !  called with: 
00047   !               x=rano(iseed)
00048   !
00049   !  returns real number in the interval (0.0 - 1.0)
00050   !  set iseed = -ve integer before using call
00051   !
00052   !  Example of calling routine:
00053   !
00054   !      subroutine coords
00055   !      include 'common.h'
00056   !
00057   !      iseed1 = -11
00058   !      iseed2 = -7
00059   !
00060   !
00061   !      do i=1,n
00062   !     x(i)=xlen*rano(iseed1)
00063   !       y(i)=ylen*rano(iseed2)
00064   !      end do
00065   !
00066   !
00067   !      end
00068 
00069 
00070   ! - routine taken from Numerical Recipies, p195
00071   !
00072   real function rano(idum)
00073     implicit none
00074     integer :: idum
00075     real, save :: dseed, dum
00076     real, save :: v(97), y
00077     integer, save :: iff, icall, i, j
00078     data iff,icall/0,0/
00079     if (idum.lt.0.or.iff.eq.0) then
00080        !  first call generates new sequence
00081        iff = 1
00082        dseed=abs(idum)*1.0
00083        idum=1
00084        do  j=1,97
00085           dum=genran(dseed)
00086        end do
00087        do j=1,97
00088           v(j)=genran(dseed)
00089        end do
00090        y=genran(dseed)
00091     endif
00092 
00093     !  next index - make sure we don't overstep array bounds if
00094     !  generator returns a 0.0 or 1.0
00095 
00096     j=max(mod(1+int(97.*y),98),1)
00097     if(j.gt.97.or.j.lt.1) then
00098        write (6,*) 'Call: ',icall
00099        write (6,*) 'idum = ',idum,'j = ',j,' y= ',y
00100        write (6,*) 'Random No. generator not initialised properly'
00101        write (6,*) 'dummy =',dum,' dseed=',dseed
00102        write (6,100) (i,v(i),i=1,97)
00103 100    format (i4,f10.6)
00104        stop
00105     endif
00106     !  get next variate and generate new one to fill gap
00107 
00108     y=v(j)
00109     rano=y
00110     v(j)=genran(dseed)
00111     icall = icall + 1
00112 
00113     return
00114   end function rano
00115 
00116 
00117   real function genran (dseed)                                      
00118     !                                  specifications for arguments         
00119     real ::  dseed                                          
00120     !                                  specifications for local variables   
00121     !    real ::  d2p31m,d2p31                                   
00122     real ::  d2p31m,d2p31    
00123     !                                  d2p31m=(2**31) - 1                   
00124     !                                  d2p31 =(2**31)(or an adjusted value) 
00125     data               d2p31m/2147483647.0/                          
00126     data               d2p31 /2147483648.0/                          
00127     !                                  first executable statement           
00128     dseed = mod(16807.0*dseed,d2p31m)                               
00129     genran = dseed / d2p31                                            
00130     return                                                            
00131   end function genran
00132 
00133   !  ========================================
00134   !
00135   !      function   PHASE
00136   !
00137   !  Returns -pi -> pi (4-quadrant) phase of complex pair (x,y)
00138   !
00139   !  ========================================
00140 
00141   real function phase(x,y)
00142     implicit none
00143     real, parameter :: pi=3.1415926536
00144     real, intent(in) :: x,y
00145     integer :: sx,sy,itx
00146 
00147     sx=sign(1.,x)
00148     sy=sign(1.,y)
00149     itx = (1-sx)/2  ! 0 or 1
00150 
00151     ! special cases first
00152     if (x.eq.0 .and. y.eq.0) then
00153        phase = 0.
00154     else if (x.eq.0.) then
00155        phase = sy*pi/2.
00156     else if (y.eq.0) then
00157        phase = itx*pi
00158     else
00159        phase = atan(y/x)+itx*sy*pi
00160     endif
00161 
00162   end function phase
